title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max, 256GB, Blue Titanium
author: Apple Inc.
main_content_summary: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a titanium design, A17 Pro chip, advanced camera system with 5x telephoto zoom, and USB-C connectivity in a 6.7-inch display.
description: Revolutionary iPhone 15 Pro Max with titanium construction, professional-grade camera system, and industry-leading performance powered by A17 Pro chip.
